text: Joseph Zhu Baoyu (July 2, 1921 - May 7, 2020) was a Chinese bishop of the Roman Catholic Church. He was Bishop Emeritus of Nanyang. The Chinese government considers him to be Titular Bishop of the Diocese. He was born in Pushan, Henan, China. Zhu Baoyu, in February 2020 and was diagnosed with COVID-19 in Henan. He died on May 7, 2020 at the age of 98.Mgr Joseph Zhu Baoyu, bishop emeritus of Nanyang, has passed away ==References== Category:2020 deaths Category:1921 births Category:Chinese Roman Catholic bishops Category:Deaths from the COVID-19 pandemic in China Category:People from Henan
title: Joseph Zhu Baoyu
